item.title: Lavatory Waste Systems (Including Wheelchair Accessible Lavatories) – System Leaks

remarks.para: Associated lavatory system(s) may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Associated components are deactivated or isolated to prevent leaks,
The Pilot-in-Command will determine if flight duration is acceptable with an Upper Deck lavatory usable, and
Associated lavatory door(s) is secured closed and placarded INOPERATIVE - DO NOT ENTER.

note.para: These provisions are not intended to prohibit inspections by crewmembers.

placard.para: Placard Waste Tank Service Panel: "WASTE TANK INOP" and associated lavatory door. "INOPERATIVE - DO NOT ENTER". Enter items in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: For an inoperative lavatory waste system:

caution.para: DO NOT ADD THE PRECHARGE CHEMICAL TO THE ASSOCIATED WASTE TANK.
